cs2110.collision
Class Shape

java.lang.Object
  cs2110.collision.Shape

public class Shape
extends java.lang.Object

An instance is a collection of blocks.

Constructor Summary

          Constructor: An instance containing blocks.

          (Further) displace this shape by displacement vector v.
